text:
e="preserve">Suresh Angadi (1 June 1955 – 23 September 2020) was an Indian politician. He was a member of parliament from 2004 until his death. He was Minister of State for Railways from 2019 until his death in 2020. He was a leader of Bharatiya Janata Party from Karnataka. He was born in Karnataka, India.
Angadi died on 23 September 2020 at a hospital in New Delhi from COVID-19 at the age of 65.
